rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey Vasara? What can
you see from up here?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0002
rows.name: ...The city

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, obviously... But is there
something specific about the city?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0004
rows.name: ...The lights.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0005
rows.name: The lights?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0006
rows.name:
In the still, cold darkness of
night warm lights shine as
evidence of human existence.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0007
rows.name:
Behind each light is the life of
someone living in this city.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0008
rows.name:
But I wonder how many of them
are truly living happy lives...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0009
rows.name:
You know Vasara, you
sometimes talk like a poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0010
rows.name:
You know Vasara, you
sometimes sound like a poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0011
rows.name:
Vasara, you occasionally
speak as if you were a poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey Vasara, you sometimes
talk like some kinda poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0013
rows.name: Poetry? You think my words are poetic?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm only speaking honestly
about what I see I don't
mean to sound poetic...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0016
rows.name: Shall I ask something?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0017
rows.name: Why do you refuse to kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0018
rows.name: Why do you go around helping people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0019
rows.name: Let me ask something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0020
rows.name: Why don't you kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0021
rows.name: Why do you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0022
rows.name: Shall I try asking something?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0023
rows.name: Why is it you refuse to kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0024
rows.name: Why do you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0025
rows.name: I think I'll ask something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0026
rows.name: Why do ya stick to not killing?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0027
rows.name: Why do ya help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0101
rows.name: Well now...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0102
rows.name:
I don't strike people down, I strike
down the evil in their hearts...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0103
rows.name: So in that way, I don't take lives...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0104
rows.name:
It's not out of sympathy
for my opponents.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0105
rows.name:
It's because killing them
would be far too simple.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0106
rows.name: Too sime?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0107
rows.name:
Killing someone means allowing them
to escape their sins, doesn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0108
rows.name:
I have no intention of
forgiving sins so easily.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0109
rows.name:
To live on and continue
atoning is, in a sense,
more painful than death.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0110
rows.name:
That's why I believe that only
by doing this can I truly make
them atone for their sins.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0111
rows.name:
So life can be more
painful than death...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0112
rows.name:
You really are a poet
after all, Vasara.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0113
rows.name:
So life can be more
painful than death...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0114
rows.name:
You really are a poet
after all, Vasara.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0115
rows.name:
To think that living can be
more difficult than dying...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0116
rows.name: Hmm, you truly are a poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0117
rows.name:
So life can be more
painful than death...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0118
rows.name: Ya really are a poet, Vasara.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0119
rows.name: Heh... I'm no poet.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0120
rows.name: Just a killer...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0121
rows.name:
I'll need your help to continue
striking down the wicked.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0201
rows.name:
...That's not an easy
question to answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0202
rows.name:
It would be easy to talk about
making the world better or destroying
evil. Grand ideals like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0203
rows.name:
I don't concern myself
with such lofty thoughts.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0204
rows.name:
So why do you help people then?
Like you did recently...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0205
rows.name:
Many claim that all people are
equal but this world is far
from treating people equally

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0206
rows.name:
The laws that govern this world
are still flawed and twisted.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0207
rows.name:
In this world, those who disregard
morals and rules hold power, while the
weak are exploited and made to suffer

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0208
rows.name:
I don't want to abandon such
people I want to save them,
even if I'm the only one...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0209
rows.name: That's all there is to it, really.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0210
rows.name:
So you just want to help
people when you see them
suffering, is that it?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0211
rows.name:
That sounds like a long, hard
road ahead but I'm with you!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0212
rows.name:
So you just can't look away when
someone's in trouble, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0213
rows.name:
I like that philosophy
It's a good way to live.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0214
rows.name:
So ultimately it's about
aiding the weak and bringing
down the powerful.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0215
rows.name:
I agree with that philosophy Let's
continue with this approach.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0216
rows.name:
So you're cutting down evil
people to fix the world.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0217
rows.name: That's a good reason... I dig that.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0218
rows.name: Hahaha...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0219
rows.name:
Indeed, with you by my side
I can strike down evil and
save people without doubt.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0220
rows.name:
My Driver I'll be counting
on you from now on.
